attributes.action: Make background music optional on freeview tv
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I find it impossible to hear  the speech on very many programmes as nearly 100 per cent including documentaries, have loud music playing most of the time. 
I would like to be able to turn it off in the same way I can turn subtitles on. 
It should be easy to include in Freeview.
